INSERT INTO `device_register_block`( id_device_list, id_template, id_device_group, id_register_block, addr,COUNT,id_type_function,STATUS) SELECT device_list.id AS id_device_list, template_library.id AS id_template, device_list.id_device_group, register_block.id AS id_register_block, register_block.addr,register_block.COUNT,register_block.id_type_function,register_block.STATUS FROM device_list INNER JOIN device_group ON device_group.id=device_list.id_device_group INNER JOIN template_library ON template_library.id=device_group.id_template INNER JOIN register_block ON template_library.id=register_block.id_template WHERE device_list.id= :id;

INSERT INTO `device_point_list`(id_pointkey, id_device_list, id_template, id_device_group, id_point_list, NAME,nameedit,id_type_units, unitsedit,equation,config,register,id_type_datatype,id_type_byteorder,slope,slopeenabled,OFFSET,offsetenabled, multreg,multregenabled,userscaleenabled,invalidvalue,invalidvalueenabled,extendednumpoints,extendedregblocks,STATUS) SELECT point_list.id_pointkey, device_list.id, point_list.id_template, device_list.id_device_group, point_list.id AS id_point_list, point_list.name, point_list.nameedit,point_list.id_type_units, point_list.unitsedit,point_list.equation,point_list.config,point_list.register, point_list.id_type_datatype,point_list.id_type_byteorder,point_list.slope,point_list.slopeenabled,point_list.OFFSET,point_list.offsetenabled, point_list.multreg,point_list.multregenabled,point_list.userscaleenabled,point_list.invalidvalue,point_list.invalidvalueenabled, point_list.extendednumpoints,point_list.extendedregblocks,point_list.status FROM device_list INNER JOIN device_group ON device_group.id=device_list.id_device_group INNER JOIN template_library ON template_library.id=device_group.id_template INNER JOIN point_list ON template_library.id=point_list.id_template WHERE device_list.id= :id;
